character.description: Hiroki is a Pokémon Trainer that battled against Ash`s Rockruff and Ash at the Pokémon School. He lost the battle after Ash`s Rockruff used the Z-Move Ultra Dash Attack. Hiroki is based off of Hiroki Kobari (古張裕起) who`s stage name is Abareru-kun, one of the hosts of Pokénchi. He revealed on Pokénchi #75 that this character Hiroki was based off of him.

character.name: Dorobanko (Hiroki)
character.description: Hiroki`s Mudbray battled against Ash`s Rockruff and Ash at the Pokémon School. It lost the battle after Ash`s Rockruff used the Z-Move Ultra Dash Attack.

character.name: Maamane no Chichioya
character.description: Sophocles`s Father lives with his family on Melemele Island in the Alola region close by to the Pokémon School. He built the research laboratory called the Māmane Lab for his son Sophocles.

character.name: Maamane no Okaasan
character.description: Sophocles`s Mother lives with her family on Melemele Island in the Alola region close by to the Pokémon School. She is very good at cooking and makes homemade malasadas that are the best according to Sophocles.

character.name: DJ Leo
character.description: Dugtrio with DJ Leo or "Dugleo" for short is a group that does music concerts. They performed in the Alola region when Ash was there. After Digda joined the group, the group name became: "Dugtrio and Digda with DJ Leo" or "Digdugleo" for short. Leo is a childhood friend of Professor Kukui. Leo changed his style since they were kids though as the professor didn`t recognize Leo even during the concert. His life changed completely when he met Dugtrio and no one is more surprised by his chances than Leo himself. One day Leo got lost in the woods and he heard voices in the distance. He followed the voices and saw Dugtrio and he thought it was as if the very blessings of the land were singing. They became friends and started doing music together and then Dugleo was born as a result.

character.name: Dugtrio (DJ Leo)
character.description: Dugtrio with DJ Leo or "Dugleo" for short is a group that does music concerts. They performed in the Alola region when Ash was there. Dugtrio is an Alolan Form Dugtrio and their shining gold whiskers provide them with protection and a unique look. Many spectators of their concerts wear wigs that match those whiskers. The one with long hair whiskers is Jessica, the one with the bob cut is Ashley and the one with the perm is Michael. It`s Ability is Tangling Hair. One day DJ Leo got lost in the woods and he heard voices in the distance. He followed the voices and saw Dugtrio and he thought it was as if the very blessings of the land were singing. They became friends and started doing music together and then Dugleo was born as a result.

character.name: Digda (DJ Leo)
character.description: Diglet liked the singing of DJ Leo`s Dugtrio and wanted to join the group. It appeared at their concert in the Alola region and then later at the place they were staying at. It did an impromptu audition and Dugtrio liked its singing. DJ Leo`s Diglet is an Alolan Form. It wears a wig that was given to it by Rotom Pokédex. After Digda joined the group, the group name became: "Dugtrio and Digda with DJ Leo" or "Digdugleo" for short. It took the center position because DJ Leo`s Dugtrio all wanted the center spot.

character.name: Suiren no Okaasan
character.description: Both the English and Japanese closed captions for SM24 do not give a name for her and just list her as Lana`s Mother. She is the mother of Sarah, Harper and Lana and lives with them in the Alola Region on Melemele Island. Parents and Guardians were invited to the Pokémon School for Visitation Day. Lana`s Mother made her first brief appearance catching her kids who were running around the school and tried to calm them down by telling them they could go to the Pokémon School when they were older. Despite her brief appearance in the episode, Lana`s Mother has spawned a huge popularity in the Pokémon Fanart community as well as in the hentai doujinshi market due to her scene in SM24 which featured her children rubbing up against her large breasts as she tried to wrangle them up.

character.name: Zip
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle.

character.name: Wrap
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle. When she first met Meowth, she was enamoured with Meowth by praising it and fawning over it. She wanted to get it because it could talk but Jessie though wouldn`t allow her to take it. Her attitude towards it completely changed though when Meowth won the competition to get the Dark Crystal and she said she hated it.

character.name: Zubat (Wrap)
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle. Rapp has multiple Zubat`s but it is virtually impossible to determine the difference.

character.name: Dustdas (Zip)
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle. Garbodor battled in a forest after Ash and Kaiwe were knocked out of the sky after just after leaving Kiawe`s family farm but it was quickly defeated when Pikachu attacked Team Skull with Gigavolt Havoc.

character.name: Yatoumori (Tupper)
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle. Tupp has multiple Salandit`s but it is virtually impossible to determine the difference. Its ability to quickly and easily climb steep cliffs was shown off when it quickly got to the Dark Crystal in SM25 but it wasn`t strong enough to get it out of the rock that it was embedded in.

character.name: Dendimushi (Maamane)
character.description: As a going away moving present, Ash and his Pokémon searched the forest for a Charjabug. He had trouble finding one but Ash`s Rockruff managed to find it and he brought it in a cage to Sophocles so he could catch it. Dendimushi is able to store up electricity and even provide it to other Pokémon. Sophocles`s Togedemaru quickly battled Charjabug and defeated it so that Sophocles could get it. Sophocles always wanted a Dendimushi and now thanks to Ash, he got one.

character.name: Skull-dan`in
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle.

character.name: Youngoose (Zip)
character.description: Team Skull Grunts are nasty bunch of people that will force people into battling them if you don`t watch your words and then try to take their opponents Pokémon as their prize for winning the battle. Zipp has multiple Yungoos`s but it is virtually impossible to determine the difference. Zipp`s Yungoos all attacked at the Pokémon School but they were no match for Kiawe`s Turtonator`s Dynamic Full Flame and all 3 of them were defeated.

character.name: Lugarugan (Gladio)
character.description: A rumor of a really strong Pokémon Trainer that had been visiting Melemele Island and was accompanied by a Midnight Form Lugarugan, spread to the Pokémon School. It ended up being Lillie`s brother. Both Skull Gang and Rocket Gang thought it would be worth getting as it was a powerful Pokémon. It defeated Tupp, Zipp and Rapp`s Pokémon in a single attack. After witnessing that battle, Jessie noted that since they treat evil and justice as the same thing, that Lugarugan which is creepy and cool would be a perfect match for them. Musashi kept getting its name wrong though and kept calling it Luganga. Meowth said that Lugarugan was filled with extreme bloodthirst.

character.name: Eievui (Gladio)
character.description: One day when he was a young boy, Gladion found this Eevee in the tall grass. It was hurt and crying. He picked it up and brought it back home and showed it to James (Alola). They immediately gave it first aid treatment and then take took it to Nurse Joy (Alola) where it recovered.

character.name: Blacky (Gladio)
character.description: Gladion`s Umbreon is the evolved form of Gladion`s Eevee. It seems to stay outside of its Poké Ball a lot and walks beside Gladion on their travels. When Rocket Gang stole Gladion`s Lycanroc (Midnight Form), it managed to burst it`s tire with its Dark Pulse to stop them from getting away.

character.name: Olu`olu
character.description: Olu`olu-kun is a Pokébase player who is currently busy playing the game in the pro league as a member of the Koikings team. He hit a come-from-behind out-of-the-park walk-off home run to be the champions of the first half of the season. He was born on Melemele Island in the Alola Region. At the request of Samson Oak and Professor Kukui, he was a special coach one day at the Pokémon School where he used to attend as a student. He was told there were some students at the school who were interested in Pokébase and he had a spare moment one day to teach them about the game. He played a couple rounds with them and was instrumental in beating Team Rocket in the second match. Jessie was a very sensible hunk and wanted his autograph. She didn`t know anything about Pokébase but was just infatuated with his good looks. Oluolu agreed to give her an autograph if they beat the Pokémon School Pokébase. In the end, they lost that match but Oluolu gave her an autograph as a thank you for a nice game.

character.name: Kabigon (Olu`olu)
character.description: Oluolu`s Snorlax is a Pokébase player who is currently busy playing the game in the pro league as a member of the Koikings team. During the match verses Team Rocket, the strategy of Team Rocket was to always hit the ball towards Oluolu`s Snorlax because it was always sleeping even during the game and it appeared to be very slow. That strategy seemed to work as Team Rocket scored a lot of runs during the game and the ball would bounce off of Snorlax`s stomach and onto the field. In the bottom of the 9th, the ball hit his bat and it used the Z-Move Pulverizing Pancake to quickly run around the bases and flatten Wobbuffet to score the game winning run at home plate.

character.name: Lugarugan (Lychee)
character.description: Olivia`s Lycanroc is her main Pokémon and it seems to stay out of its Poké Ball quite often. It quickly became friends with Ash`s Rockruff and the two of them were seen curled up together on the deck of the boat sleeping. Olivia`s Lycanroc was able to help save a trapped Wailer by smashing the surrounding rocks that it had got stuck in.

character.name: Tsurimeijin
character.description: The Master Fisherman of Akala Island has been a fisherman for 40 years or maybe even 99 years. His story kept changing every time he told it. Apparently, those that want to fish for the lunker known as the Lord of the Lake in a lake near Brooklet Hill need his permission to battle it. He has "scars" that are badges of honor that he received in mortal combat with the Lord of the Lake though they flaked off. The master fisherman required that people asserted themselves if they are qualified fishermen to try to battle the Lord of the Lake and first catch a Hinbass as proof of their skills. Lana had caught a Hinbass before he could finish explaining the requirement. He had "apparently" been a master fisherman for 99 years and in all those years he had never seen such an amazing battle before between Lana and what ended up being a School Form Wishiwashi.

character.name: Garagara (Kaki)
character.description: Kiawe first encountered Marowak when it stole the Wela Crown during the Wela Fire Festival. It is said that when it is placed on a Pokémon`s head, it can become valiant and strong like Wela Volcano itself. Kiawe and Turtonator took up the task of retrieving the crown. Kiawe`s Turtonator was instrumental in battling Marowak but it lost the first match against because they were in a rush to get the crown back and Kiawe wasn`t paying proper attention to their opponent. He didn`t read Marowak`s actions and he just thought they could win as long as they unleashed a Z-Move but battling is all about watching their opponent closely and understanding them. After a training session with Ash and Pikachu, they challenged Marowak and were prepared this time. Shell Smash was a risky move to use in the battle but was used as a setup move in combination with Inferno Overdrive to knock out Marowak and win the rematch battle. They were able to return the Wela Crown after Marowak gave it up. Kiawe`s Marowak took the crown and wore it because it wanted to grow stronger. The rematch battle made Kiawe realize that and also that its heart burns with passion, just like his does. Marowak is kind of obnoxious but it wanted to become a partner with Kiawe and it was caught willingly after the rematch battle.

character.name: Dainose (Lychee)
character.description: Olivia`s Probopass and Olivia`s Lycanroc battled against Ash`s Rockruff and Ash`s Rowlet during the Grand Trial for Ash at the Ruins of Life on Akala Island. As the Compass Pokémon, it freely controls three units called Mini-Noses with magnetic force and it played a large role in the battle. The Mini-Noses` formation attack couldn`t be underestimated because the Magnet Bomb could deal heavy damage even if only one of them hit. In a Double Battle, the Mini-Noses` made the match a five against two which put Ash at an overwhelming disadvantage. Probopass provided mostly support for Olivia`s Lycanroc which did most of the attacks during the battle. It got knocked out by Ash`s Rowlet using the Grass-type Z-Crystal and attacking with the Z-Move Bloom Doom.

character.name: Type: Null (Gladio)
character.description: While on Akala Island, Gladion went into a cave and Gladion`s Type: Null was revealed when it was released from its Premier Ball. He didn`t want anyone to see it and it was restless due to the muzzle on its face that couldn`t be removed that time to make it a lot more comfortable.

character.name: Lugarugan (Satoshi)
character.description: Ash`s Lycanroc is the evolved form of Ash`s Rockruff. It evolved on Akala Island at the Ruins of Life at dusk. A rare natural phenomenon that occurs at sunset and sunrise called a Green Flash occurred and triggered the evolving process. It evolved into a surprise form of Lugarugan that aren`t in any books or zukan.

character.name: Ana
character.description: Ana is the on-the-spot reporter as well as the host of the television show: "Locally Reputed Gourmet Restaurant Special". She is the ever-smiling idol reporter and loves feeding the public everything they`d ever want to know. In SM 13, she was the race side announcer for the Pokémon Pancake Race. At the time of the episode, she was an unnamed character and he name wasn`t confirmed until SM 39 when she introduced herself on TV. She had a brief cameo on TV as the news desk reporter that announced that "Dugtrio with DJ Leo", or "Dugleo" for short had suddenly split-up and had made all of Alola engulfed by grief.

character.name: Yareyuutan
character.description: Oranguru lives in the forest near Mallow house on Melemele Island in the Alola Region. Just around the time that Mallow`s Father opened the Aina Cafeteria, he was in the forest and zoned out and ended up getting lost. He tripped and fell down a hill and injured himself. Oranguru not only nursed him back to health, but also listened to his problems and served him a delicious Pile Juice. Word about the "master" as Mallow`s Father calls him eventually spread to the city and they all worked together to build the café so that islanders wanting to soothe their souls could come there. Mallow ran into the forest one day after getting mad with her father and tripped an fell down the hill in a similar manner injuring her knee. She met Oranguru and it treated her injury and also listened to her problems while serving her Pile Juice which she recognized as tasting similar to the one that her father served in his restaurant. When Team Rocket showed up and had captured Mallow`s Steenee, it showed that it was a highly intelligent Pokémon that has skillful command of manmade tools. It used its the fan-like object consisting of layers of leaves bound together with its own fur to fight against them and managed to rescue Mallow`s Steenee.

character.name: Kanoa
character.description: Kanoa is a Seafolk person who travels the seas and the world. He is a treasure hunter that is in search of valuable things. He salvages treasure that is at the bottom of the ocean floor. He heard of a storm that sunk a ship long ago near Melemele Island and he managed to find the ship but was unable to recover the cargo because a Dadarin was guarding it. He is in love with I`a who travels with him but it was unclear if they were married.

character.name: I`a
character.description: I`a is a Seafolk person who travels the seas and the world. Her friend Kanoa travels with her but it was unclear if they were married. She does shows with her Osyamari to support them as Kanoa hasn`t found any significant treasures. They heard of a storm that sunk a ship long ago near Melemele Island and they managed to find the ship but were unable to recover the cargo because a Dadarin was guarding it. I`a spent some time with Lana`s Popplio to help it train to get stronger so it could properly use the Z-Move Hydro Vortex. The training proved successful as it was able to use the move to save everyone on the boat from drowning in the whirlpool created by Dadarin.

character.name: Osyamari (I`a)
character.description: I`a`s Brionne travels with the Seafolk people does shows with Ia to support them as Kanoa hasn`t found any significant treasures. They heard of a storm that sunk a ship long ago near Melemele Island and they managed to find the ship but were unable to recover the cargo because a Dadarin was guarding it. Brionne spent some time with Lana`s Popplio to help it train to get stronger so it could properly use the Z-Move Hydro Vortex. I`a`s Brionne got to tired out trying to fight off Dadarin and Lana`s Popplio training proved successful as it was able to use the move to save everyone on the boat from drowning in the whirlpool created by Dadarin.

character.name: Electric Princess
character.description: Electric Princess are a Dendimushi Race team that participated in the 25th Kokeko Cup. They managed to get to the final stage of the race but their car crashed into Ash after he jumped in the way to save Sophocles`s Charjabug from being hit by the Electric Princess car which was skidding on ice.

character.name: Science Speed
character.description: Science Speed are a Dendimushi Race team that participated in the 25th Kokeko Cup. They managed to get to the second stage of the race but their car got stuck in the sand.

character.name: Twin Starmie
character.description: Twin Starmie are a Dendimushi Race team that participated in the 25th Kokeko Cup. They only managed to get part way through the first stage as they tried to copy the body ramp technique that Sophocles thought of to get over the rocks but their car fell apart when it landed hard.

character.name: Hayate
character.description: Hayate is the director of Team Red Meteor and he gives his others teammates instructions on what to do. His father did everything in his power to find the ultimate Dendimushi which was even alternately colored. He is very cocky and according to Rotom Pokédex, he is 100 percent unpleasant. Hayate`s brother Yansu is also on the team. He competed in the 25th Kokeko Cup where they were the self-imposed favorites to win the race and his pushy nature ended up being too much for their Dendimushi car which got stuck on ice going up a hill in the 3rd and final stage, resulting in them loosing the race to Sophocles`s Charjabug car.

character.name: Yansu
character.description: Yansu is the runner of Team Red Meteor and he runs alongside their car during races. His father did everything in his power to find the ultimate Dendimushi which was even alternately colored. He is very cocky and sure of himself and according to Rotom Pokédex, he is 100 percent unpleasant. Yansu`s brother Hayate is also on the team. He competed in the 25th Kokeko Cup where they were the self-imposed favorites to win the race and his brother`s pushy nature ended up being too much for their Dendimushi car which got stuck on ice going up a hill in the 3rd and final stage, resulting in them loosing the race to Sophocles`s Charjabug car.

character.name: Dana
character.description: Dana is the mechanic of Team Red Meteor and he performs machine maintenance and changes tires during races. He competed in the 25th Kokeko Cup where they where the team was the self-imposed favorites to win the race but Hayate`s pushy nature ended up being too much for their Dendimushi car which got stuck on ice going up a hill in the 3rd and final stage, resulting in them loosing the race to Sophocles`s Charjabug car.

character.name: Dendimushi (Hayate)
character.description: Hayate`s Charjabug is the car Pokémon for Team Red Meteor. Hayate`s father did everything in his power to find the ultimate Dendimushi which was even alternately colored. It has the fastest Nature, Timid and the perfect Ability, Run Away! As it is an alternately colored Red Denjimushi, it automatically was considered to be the fastest and race favourite. This is also a joke referencing the original Gundam Char Red Comet`s mobile suit red trope, where his suit was painted red and was three times faster. It competed in the 25th Kokeko Cup where Hayate`s pushy nature ended up being too much for their Dendimushi car which got stuck on ice going up a hill in the 3rd and final stage, resulting in them loosing the race to Sophocles`s Charjabug car.

character.name: Cosmog
character.description: While sleeping one night, Ash had a dream where Solgaleo and Lunala appeared to him at the Altar of the Sun and moments later Starcloud came out from the light. He made a promise to them to watch over the Cosmog. The next day on the way to school, Tapu Koko appeared and directed Ash to where the Cosmog was sleeping. He picked it up and took it to the Pokémon School where no one was able to identify the type of Pokémon that it is. Lillie decided to call the Cosmog "Starcloud" because its inner body shines like twinkling stars and it floats gently in the air much like a cloud, so its name is a combination of the the words star and cloud.

character.name: Sauboh
character.description: Faba is a scientist that works for the Aether Foundation as the chief of the research department. He is a bit jealous of Professor Burnet and often makes highly illogical conclusions to make her look bad.

character.name: Burnet-hakase
character.description: Professor Burnet was first seen in the anime on TV for the announcement that she had won the 15th Alola Lady Award which goes to the Alola region`s woman of the year. Although each year`s winner of the award is chosen among prominent women in a variety of fields, this was the first time it is awarded to an active scientist. The professor`s research prowess and friendly nature were both key factors to her receiving the award this year. Professor Kukui called her unique and an excellent researcher. Her studies specialize in Ultra Holes. She created a device that can detect Ultra Aura but Faba is very jealous of her and pretended to say that the device was malfunctioning when they were investigating the high amounts of Ultra Aura at The Altar of the Sunne one night.

character.name: Wicke
character.description: Wicke is an member of the Aether Foundation where she is in charge of their Pokémon conservation efforts. She helped measured abnormally high amounts of Ultra Aura in the vicinity of the Altar of the Sunne at Poni Island the night that Ash had his Starcloud (Cosmog) dream. When she came to meet Ash and Starcloud (Cosmog), she told them that they had a wide variety of Pokémon conservation facilities and that Ash could safely entrust the Cosmog to them but he explained that he`d made a promise to look after the Cosmog.

character.name: Gonbe (Burnet-hakase)
character.description: Professor Burnet`s Munchlax was briefly seen on TV as part of a news clip about Professor Burnet winning the Alola Lady Award. It seemed very happy and energetic and put its face right up in the camera.

character.name: Pippi (Lusamine)
character.description: Lusamine`s Clefairy was talked about by Lillie and her mother Lusamine in an argument. Lillie wanted to raise it without evolving it because she preferred it that way as it was cuter than Lusamine`s Clefable. Lusamine evolved it into a Clefable because it was her Pokémon and not Lillie`s.

character.name: Pixy (Lusamine)
character.description: Lusamine`s Clefairy was talked about by Lillie and her mother Lusamine in an argument. Lillie wanted to raise it without evolving it because she preferred it that way as it was cuter than Lusamine`s Clefable. Lusamine evolved it into a Clefable because it was her Pokémon and not Lillie`s.

character.name: Herderrier (Lusamine)
character.description: Lusamine`s Herdier was seen sitting beside Lusamine`s office desk at the Aether Paradise residence mansion. It seems patient enough to endure Lusamine`s eccentric personality without getting annoyed or upset like Lillie often does with her mother.

character.name: Foodin (Sauboh)
character.description: Faba`s Alakazam often double battles with Faba`s Hypno as the battle combination proves to be a difficult one to defend against with their powerful psychic moves. Alakazam often uses Psychic to physically control the movements of its opponents.

character.name: Sleeper (Sauboh)
character.description: Faba`s Hypno often double battles with Faba`s Alakazam as the battle combination proves to be a difficult one to defend against with their powerful psychic moves. It is used by Faba to erase the memories of people like Lillie to help further his evil goals.

character.name: Amajo (Mao)
character.description: Mallow`s Tsareena is the evolved form of Mallow`s Steenee. It evolved when it banged on the top of a cage that Ash was caught in and it learned the move Stomp as a result of its efforts.

character.name: Pikarla
character.description: Pikarla is a Pokémon Trainer who works in the Pikachu Valley with a bunch of Pikachu. She loves Pikachu`s and dresses up like one with a tail and headband ears. She gave Ash and his friends a set each to wear when they visited the valley. All the Pikachu in the Valley are her`s and she gets Pikachu all day long. Even though she has a lot of them already, she`s nowhere near done getting more Pikachu`s. For all the guests to the valley, Pikarla has three rules they must follow while they are there: Number one: Become a Pikachu in spirit! Number two: Love all Pikachu! Number three: Pikaspeak: Whenever you say something, add a "Pika" at the end! Those who follow these rules can become residents of the Pikachu Valley, or "Pikafriends". She has a Z-Ring which she uses with her Pikachu (Boss) but it is normally hidden behind her wrist scrunchie.

character.name: Pikachu (Pikarla)
character.description: Pikachu went up to befriend all of Pikarla`s Pikachu in the valley but they put their guard up and it wasn`t till Kurin, a bold female Pikachu approached Pikachu. She and the rest of Pikarla`s Pikachu misinterpreted Ash`s Pikachu initial greeting as flirting and left it. It can be easily recognized, as she has very curly bangs, so Pikarla called it Curly-chan because of that. It later came back and touched tails with Ash`s Pikachu to which Hoshi and Pikarla believed that Ash`s Pikachu gave her butterflies because it was now glossy and more appealing to her. When Rocket Gang attacked, it was captured by them but Pikarla`s Pikachu (Boss) used the Z-move Catastropika to on them and Jessie`s Mimikyu to send the Rocket`s flying while releasing all the Pikachu at the same time. After being rescued by Pikarla`s Pikachu (Boss), she fell in love with him. This Pikachu is voiced by Nicole Fujita who was voice acting for the very first time.

character.name: Pikachu (Pikarla)
character.description: Pikarla`s Pikachu (Boss) is an alternately colored Pikachu that lives in the Pikachu Valley in the Alola Region. It has always had a crush on Pikarla`s Pikachu (Curly) and when it saw that Ash`s Pikachu was becoming friendly with Pikarla`s Pikachu (Curly), it got jealous. It`s also possible that it didn`t approve of an outsider. It hit Ash`s Pikachu with electric shocks signalizing a duel which is one of the rules in the valley. Humans are not allowed to interfere in the battle and the first Pikachu to bite the other`s tail wins. Pikachu was a lot more experienced in battling and quickly won the duel with an Electroweb. When Rocket Gang attacked, Pikarla`s Pikachu (Curly) was captured by them but Pikarla`s Pikachu (Boss) used the Z-move Catastropika to on them and Jessie`s Mimikyu to send the Rocket`s flying while releasing all the Pikachu at the same time. After being rescued by Pikarla`s Pikachu (Boss), Pikarla`s Pikachu (Curly) fell in love with him.

character.name: Osyamari (Suiren)
character.description: Lana`s Brionne is the evolution of Lana`s Popplio. It evelved when making a giant balloon to show it`s full power to I`a when she was leaving Poni Island.

The Ol` Raise and Switch!

Currying Favor and Flavor!

Curry na Battle! Rarantesu no Mai!!
アシマリ, オシャマリ, いかりのダダリン!
Balloons, Brionne, and Belligerence!
Brionne, kuplia ja katkeruutta!
Ashimari, Osyamari, Ikari no Dadarin!
家出のマオとヤレユータン!
Mallow and the Forest Teacher!
